to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: moving from amd to p3?
body:
Hello list,
I've got an AMD system, that I would like to do my install with.
When I try to move the harddrive to my penteum 3 system, things sorta... crash.
Is there a way to do this?
I'm trying to install debian, and my p3 system doesn't have a working CD drive.

Thanks,
~~TheCreator~~
[My programs don't have bugs; just randomly added features]
